definition: to like looking attractive (usually of girls)/aestheticism

sentences.english: Nina needs nine knitting needles to knit naughty Nita's knickers nicely.
sentences.chinese: 妮娜需要九个编织针为淘气的尼特编织漂亮的灯笼裤。

sentences.english: They will expect a career growth and a magnificent actualization of a number of projects.
sentences.chinese: 他们会预期到职业的成长，一些项目会漂亮的完成。

sentences.english: Workers weave silk thread into beautiful shirts.
sentences.chinese: 工人把丝线织成漂亮的衬衫。

sentences.english: So I had a wife, beautiful; like you.
sentences.chinese: 喔我以前有个老婆，很漂亮，就像你。

sentences.english: Your raw wool scarf is so beautiful; where did you buy it?
sentences.chinese: 你这条原毛围巾真漂亮，是从哪儿买的？

sentences.english: I took three consecutive shots from beyond the three-point line and made all three-perfectly.
sentences.chinese: 我连续三次在三分线外远投，三个都进得很漂亮。
我有一间漂亮的卧室缷。

sentences.english: The invitation cards were written up daintily in white and gold.
sentences.chinese: 邀请卡是用非常漂亮的白字和金字写成的。

sentences.english: A:Arlene,what is the most besutiful place around the coutry in spring?
sentences.chinese: 艾莲，春天这个国家最漂亮的地方是哪里？

sentences.english: I know you're ready to speak English well.
sentences.chinese: 我相信你已准备好说一口漂亮的英语了。
露西有一条漂亮的裙子。

sentences.english: But his most important victory was against testicular cancer.
sentences.chinese: 但是他打得最漂亮的一场仗是战胜了睾丸癌。

sentences.english: Lesson Thirty-seven How could a beautiful girl learn Monkey Boxing?
sentences.chinese: 第三十七课哪儿有漂亮姑娘学猴拳的？

sentences.english: For instance, some clandestine publications are beautifully produced. Well, where did the paper come from?
sentences.chinese: 举例说，有些秘密刊物印得那么漂亮，哪儿来的纸？

sentences.english: I have my nice clothes on.
sentences.chinese: 我已经穿上了我最漂亮的衣服。

sentences.english: The coloured drawing on the ceiling of that old house is beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 那座老房子的彩绘承尘很漂亮。

definition: good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
warms the heart and delights the eye (idiom)/pleasing/delightful
able to withstand careful appreciation/well worth a second look
visually attractive/eye candy/easy on the eyes/to protect the eyes
pleasant/agreeable/a person after one's heart (charming person)/a gifted person
